title: Wall Street Breakfast, May 1st: The Dollar Rises Again, As Does BP
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today's top stories: The U.S. dollar has broken into positive territory; President Trump is delaying a decision on steel and aluminum tariffs; and BP is up premarket thanks to the oil recovery. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
